unittitle_ssm: Alfred E. Steers papers and photographs
abstract_ssm: The Alfred E. Steers papers and photographs, spanning the period 1886 to 1948 and measuring 3.1 linear feet, contain materials concerning the life and career of Alfred E. Steers (1860-1948). Included in the collection are correspondence; biographical material; three scrapbooks containing clippings pertaining to Steers' military service, court cases, and Brooklyn Borough presidency (1910 to 1913); photographs; and ephemera.
corpname_ssm: Brooklyn (New York, N.Y.). Office of Brooklyn Borough President
